entry.title: Little-Miss-Robot/jsonapi-client: A lightweight library for seamless JSON API communication, featuring a powerful query builder and intuitive models for effortless data handling.
entry.content: A lightweight library for seamless JSON API communication, featuring a powerful query builder and intuitive models for effortless data handling.

entry.title: martcarrefour/athena-ai: AthenaORM is a lightweight and developer-friendly library for interacting with Large Language Models (LLMs) like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google PaLM. It provides a unified interface for managing multi-turn conversations, handling JSON or text-based responses, and simplifying API integrations.
entry.content: AthenaORM is a lightweight and developer-friendly library for interacting with Large Language Models (LLMs) like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google PaLM. It provides a unified interface for managing multi-turn conversations, handling JSON or text-based responses, and simplifying API integrations.

entry.content: Opensource IDE For Exploring and Testing Api's (lightweight alternative to postman/insomnia)

entry.title: in-c0/Gitsum-Github-Repo-Analyser: A lightweight, user-friendly platform that analyzes GitHub repositories, generates summaries of key files, and makes the repository easy to understand. (backend is down right now - I'll continue working on it sometime soon)
entry.content: A lightweight, user-friendly platform that analyzes GitHub repositories, generates summaries of key files, and makes the repository easy to understand. (backend is down right now - I'll continue working on it sometime soon)

entry.title: SanthoshM007/Wikipedia-Clone: A lightweight clone of Wikipedia built using modern web technologies. Features include article creation, editing, and viewing with support for Markdown. Utilizes a database to store articles and user data, enabling seamless content management and search functionality. Ideal for learning and showcasing full-stack development skills.
entry.content: A lightweight clone of Wikipedia built using modern web technologies. Features include article creation, editing, and viewing with support for Markdown. Utilizes a database to store articles and user data, enabling seamless content management and search functionality. Ideal for learning and showcasing full-stack development skills.

entry.title: yusef-okasha97/CI-CD-Quran-app-using-Github-action: OpenMusicStream is a lightweight music streaming application inspired by SoundCloud. It allows users to explore and stream their favorite tracks via a clean and responsive web interface.
entry.content: OpenMusicStream is a lightweight music streaming application inspired by SoundCloud. It allows users to explore and stream their favorite tracks via a clean and responsive web interface.

entry.title: tlonny/bearmq: A lightweight, flexible and type-safe job queue backed by Postgres.
entry.content: A lightweight, flexible and type-safe job queue backed by Postgres.

entry.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
entry.content: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.

entry.title: Psevdon1m/custom-framework: This project is an implementation of a lightweight web framework created as part of Stephen Grider's Udemy TypeScript course. It demonstrates core concepts of popular frameworks like Backbone.js and Marionette.js by building a simplified version with TypeScript.
entry.content: This project is an implementation of a lightweight web framework created as part of Stephen Grider's Udemy TypeScript course. It demonstrates core concepts of popular frameworks like Backbone.js and Marionette.js by building a simplified version with TypeScript.
